name: protvista-structure
description: A custom element wrapper for LiteMol

scripts.copy-dependencies: cp litemol-dist-2.4.1/js/LiteMol-plugin.min.js dist/ && cp litemol-dist-2.4.1/css/LiteMol-plugin.min.css dist/css && cp litemol-dist-2.4.1/fonts/* dist/fonts
scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist/fonts && mkdirp ./dist/css && npm run copy-dependencies && rollup -c
scripts.serve: npm run rollup-watch & npm run browser-sync

author: xwatkins@ebi.ac.uk
